data.title: The world's #1 location platform
data.meta_description: HERE is a PaaS for building, deploying and scaling location solutions. Create custom maps, visualize location datasets, gather insights and buy and sell location assets.
data.text:
Should fleets cut through residential streets?

Two logistics experts debate the pros and cons of rat running to save time and money.

Map data and tools for enterprises

Build better with more accuracy, flexibility and control.

Choose the best location solution for your industry

Meet your needs and move your business forward with our location technology.

Our tools use highly-precise location data that can be adapted across industries and use cases.

Make smarter contextual decisions with richer insights

Discover spatial patterns and trends in your location data.

Create and use custom digital maps to streamline operations and improve customer experience.

Give your services a competitive edge

Build industry-leading applications

Accelerate business outcomes with a combination of data, services and APIs.

Trusted by customers worldwide

Discover our platform benefits

Work with 2D/3D representations of reality

Build a digital representation of reality with our highly precise and real-time location data in 2D/3D with 1000+ detailed attributes that capture every detail.

Work with 2D/3D representations of reality

Build a digital representation of reality with our highly precise and real-time location data in 2D/3D with 1000+ detailed attributes that capture every detail.

Speed up development and enable faster insights

Discover enterprise-grade location processing, including a full stack of analytics and ML algorithms. Enable faster insights with templates for automation and a low-code/no-code approach.

Speed up development and enable faster insights

Discover enterprise-grade location processing, including a full stack of analytics and ML algorithms. Enable faster insights with templates for automation and a low-code/no-code approach.

Customize and adapt to your business needs

Combine your location data and business insights to build custom solutions that solve your specific business challenges.

Customize and adapt to your business needs

Combine your location data and business insights to build custom solutions that solve your specific business challenges.

Make your business spatially intelligent

Choose from a range of solutions to help you integrate a real-time representation of reality into your processes.

Supply Chain

Get better visibility, track shipments and assets in real-time, both indoors and outdoors.

Fleet Management

Make deliveries safer and faster from the first to the last mile. Monitor your fleet and improve customer and driver satisfaction with dynamic route optimization and real-time visibility.

Connected Driving

Shape the next generation of in-vehicle experiences for a connected, electrified and digitalized world. Deliver intuitive navigation and unlock revenue opportunities.

Automated Driving

Create vehicle systems that are more reliable, safe and comfortable across all levels of automation.
